name: Foresight (itch) (Brad Make Games, joeyloveswaffles)
description:
This game runs better when downloaded!

Greg the astronaut is stranded on an unidentified spaceship. He must use his advanced camera to plan out a path to the exit of each level, detecting and avoiding obstacles and enemies.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Start/End Recording

E - Control Greg

R - Restart Level

This game was created for the Redefine 2021 Game Jam by Brad and Joey. 

All music was created by Michael Silvestri for this game:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsh8V7M6oaw1WAhk0eGuSTg.

All assets were created for the Redefine 2021 game jam.
